11.content: Which curve deserves the growth?
11.title: {c:pink}Amy Rose{/c}

choices: She found an artificial chaos emerald with unusual abilities
She wishes for something to help gain Sonic's affection
113.content: Ah, want the best of both worlds eh~? And how does she gain these curves?
113.title: How about both?

choices: She quickly rushes out of the workshop with the fake emerald in hand.
She stays and tells Tails what happened.
She hides from Tails to avoid showing him her upgrades.
1131.content:
It's been a rather slow and quite few days. Eggman's last attempt at world domination had been thwarted by Sonic once again, and Amy hasn't had anything exciting to do. Aside from chase after Sonic and try to gain his love, but as she visited Tails' workshop hoping to find Sonic there, he wasn't around. She was pretty disappointed when Tails told her he went out for a "casual stroll" as he mildly put it, but she chose to stick around and just hang out. It's not like she had anything better to do at the moment.

         "So what sort of invention have you built this time?" Amy asked.

         "Well, I haven't actually made anything brand new yet." Tails answered. "I've mostly been tuning up the Tornado after Eggman's last attack."

         "Oh. Say, does that thing still run on chaos emerald energy?" Amy replied curiously. She recalled hearing Tails talk about this at some point after that incident with Chaos. "I don't think I've seen you actually use the emeralds to fly your Tornado."

         Tails smiled at her question. He was always happy to have the opportunity to talk about his inventions. Even if some people don't always understand how they work. "Actually, remember when I created an fake emerald when we fought Eggman aboard the Ark? Ever since then, I've created several artificial emeralds to use as power sources for my planes!" he answered. "I guess you could say they're like chaos drives, but more powerful!"

         "More powerful? Doesn't that sound a bit dangerous?" Amy asked in concern.

         "No worries. I've taken extra precaution to make sure no accidents happen when using these." Tails answered confidently. "Here, how about I show you..." he continued as he reached into a drawer where he kept most of his spare artificial emeralds. But as his hand reached inside, the drawer was empty. "Huh? Uh-oh. Looks like I've used up my last one." he said. He got up from his desk and walked towards a room with a chaos emerald symbol on it. "Guess I better make more. Be right back, Amy." he said before entering the door and closing it.

         Amy sighed as she sat in her chair. Her head propped up by her hand and her elbow resting on a nearby table. "Something tells me he's gonna be in there for a while." she thought. She kicked her feet in the chair, waiting for him to return. Or at least waiting for something to happen. Anything. She began looking around the room, hoping to find something of interest. It was then she noticed a shinning bright blue light coming from underneath a pile of metal scraps beside the Tornado. The sparkly shine seemed oddly familiar. Eyebrow raised, she got up and made her way towards the scrap pile. Digging through it, she found the source of the light begin to glow even more once she moved the debris away. Her eyes widened when she found what it was.

         "Is...Is that a chaos emerald?" she thought to herself. But she noticed the glow wasn't as bright as the emeralds normally are. "Oh, I see. This must be one of the fake ones he was talking about earlier." she deduced. "Guess I better let him now I found one he could use." But as she reached out for it and picked it up, the fake emerald let out a sudden zap at her fingertips!

         "AAH!!" Amy jumped back in shock. Though the zap didn't hurt her too badly, it gave her a rather startling jolt. Her quills even spiked upward slightly upon contact. But that wasn't even the strangest part. Her whole body felt...odd. Not just from the shock either. She felt as though she were warming up. Specifically in her chest. She clenched her chest, wondering why she felt such a strange discomfort there. And suddenly, it happened. Her chest felt...plushier than usual. She looked down, and her eyes nearly popped out of her head at what she saw. Her nearly flat chest suddenly bulged out as her breasts began to grow! Her modest A-cups swelled rapidly into B-cups in a matter of seconds.

         Suddenly, she felt the warm sensation spread to her lower body. Her thighs, hips, and especially her butt started to increase in volume. Plumping up at the same rate as her newly formed breasts. She looked back with immense shock as she placed a hand on her ballooning bottom to feel just how big it's getting. She was so shocked, that she couldn't even speak. She just stared in silent disbelief and confusion. Her body grew for a full minute before stopping. Her boobs had become round and perky. A nice, full pair of C-cups that could barely fit within her dress. Her ass meanwhile grew to be about the same size. Her hips and thighs respectively wide and thick enough to give her a perfect hourglass figure. She ran her hands down the sides of her body, feeling her newly acquired curves as her hands traveled down her body.

         "W-What....the..." she began. But before she could say anything else, she heard the door to Tails' emerald creation room start to creak open.


What happens next?
1131.title: Unintended Side Effects

choices: Try to break in with her hammer.
Suck it up and find the nearest store to buy new clothes.
Call one of her female friends for help.
11311.content:
As she heard the door open, she felt she had to get out of there before Tails could see her. To save herself from unbelievable embarrassment, she dashed out of the main entrance. Though as she ran to the door, she had a rather difficult time dealing with the new bouncy body she had. She quickly turned the knob and rushed out. But not before Tails entered the room and saw her leaving.

         "Huh? Amy?" Tails called out to her, but the door shut closed before she could even hear him. Tails stood there in confusion. "What was that about?" he asked himself while scratching his head. "Maybe I should go after her and see if she's alright."

         Tails exited the workshop and flew his way through the sky to find her. But it seems he didn't think to just check around the outside of the workshop, as that's where Amy turned out to be. She looked up to see Tails fly off to the distance. Sighing in relief that he didn't see her and her...spontaneous upgrades. Speaking of which, she looked down at herself to take in just how big she had gotten. Her boobs were indeed a pair of C-cups with hips as wide as her shoulders, and an ass equally proportioned to her chest. An hourglass figure that could rival Rouge's. If they were jut a size or two bigger that is.

         "I-I...I can't believe this! And all this...because of this fake emerald?" Amy said as she placed one of her hands on her inflated bosom. The other still held onto the false emerald. She looked at the emerald and noticed the glow it had before had faded. Though it still lit up mildly. "But...why did it do this anyway? The real chaos emeralds never did this." She said to herself. She then turned her head as much as she could to see her expanded bottom. And realized that her skirt could no longer cover it up. "EEP!!" She yelped as she tried to pull her skirt down to cover up. Though it was a wasted effort. "Oh, what am I going to do? I can't let anybody see me like this! But I need to find something to cover up with..." she said in worry. Perhaps with Tails gone, she could go back inside to find something to drape herself with temporarily. She walked back to the main entrance. Her boobs jiggled with each step, threatening to tear out of her top. Her ass meanwhile bounced almost as vigorously. Her panties wedged between her cheeks more and more with each step. She winced as she felt it wedge deeper. "Oh, this is not gonna be fun..." she thought to herself.

         She tried to open the door, but ti wasn't turning. "Oh drat! Of course he locked it." she said in annoyance. "Now what am I gonna do?"


Indeed. What is she gonna do?
11311.title: Quick Escape!

info.brief_description: Wanna see your favorite Sonic girl with huge assets? Well now you can!
info.description:
Welcome to the Sonic Girls Breast/Ass Expansion Interactive. (I know the title doesn't say "Girls" in it. Blame the character limit.)

Here you can live out your fantasies of seeing your favorite female Sonic character gain sudden endowments through whatever means you wish. But first, let's go over the rules.

Allowed:

Any character from any continuity is allowed here. Whether they're from the games, the Archie comics, the IDW comics, or whatever else that's officially licensed by Sega.

Male characters can come in at any point in any story in this interactive.

Fan character OC's can be implemented as well.


Not Allowed:

Blood and gore. We don't need anybody getting killed in gruesome ways here.

No male expansion. Title says "Sonic Girls" breast/ass expansion. They can still do stuff with the girls, they just can expand with them.

No full belly/full body expansions. Nothing personal against that sort of thing. This is just an interactive specifically for breast and ass expansion. I apologize in advance.

Absolutely no gross-out fetishes. Like scat, farting, burping, and again no blood and gore. never understood why people like that sort of thing anyway...


Other things to note:

I understand this can't be helped for everyone, but please try to keep each chapter longer than just half a paragraph. Try to be creative and articulate with your chapters.

Have fun~
